main event: A civilian reported an unidentified flying object near Las Vegas, Nevada in late August 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as fruit-like with an estimated size of 8 to 10 feet in diameter., The object was silent and changed the light conditions in the area when it was present., The object hovered for about 5 minutes and then accelerated out of sight., Weather conditions during the sighting included thick overcast skies and limited visibility., The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 minutes.
sighted object: An unidentified flying object with fruit-like appearance
witness description: Civilian, ages 44 and 33, occupations included payroll clerk.
